page.title: 13Thorney Methodist Chapel
page.content: {Thorney Methodist Chapel}is on the northern side of the road as you come from{Peterborough.}It has 2 rooms which can be converted into 1. Outside there is a lawn, gravel, and a shed. Lessons at the Chapel are from 10:30 to 11:30am. We call this lesson{Sunday {School.}There are 3 teachers that go and 20 to 40 children. At Sunday School we sing songs from 10:30 to 11:00 and then split up into groups for our lessons. In between we have a collection and sometimes news. In the summer we go outside to work and play games. There is a service from 2:30 to 3:30pm for mostly adults. Throughout the year we have{family services,} {anniversaries, coffee mornings, jumble {sales,}and{Christmas Services.}Every year we have a{party}where the mums make the sandwiches and cakes.
